company_description: PredictHQ is the pioneer in Predictive Demand Intelligence, strengthening AI-powered demand planning by eliminating business blind spots caused by demand volatility related to external events. Our AI models are capable of adapting to changing market conditions and incorporating real-time data updates to provide up-to-the-minute insights. This dynamic approach ensures that our customers are equipped with the most accurate and relevant information to make informed decisions in a rapidly evolving environment.
